review_title: Blumont offers large area of independence but not the best base to acquire technical experience and capacities
pros:
Great experience working with minimal supervision 
Average salary
Comfortable teamwork environment 
Close to beneficiaries 
Strong in mobilization and community based protection approach
cons:
Lack of clear policy and procedures 
Lack of monitoring on the treatment of staff by seniors
Lack of strong documentation 
Lack of follow up on staff leaving the organization and the reasons for that
Poor management structure
